/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with bare trees, their leafless branches reaching towards the clear blue sky. Power lines crisscross above, forming an intricate web against the backdrop of the sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, a construction site is visible, hinting at the ongoing development and progress in the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the power lines, adding a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
